channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: About
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! My name is Brian Connor, and I am a graduate student at the University of Pennsylvania. In a sentence, I would describe myself as a creative and analytical professional strongly interested in the mechanics of data-driven decision making in the fields of politics, policy, and business strategy. Currently, I am pursuing my masterâ€™s degree in Behavioral and Decision Sciences. I hope to use insights from this program to incorporate realistic expectations about human behavior into my future modeling work.
